content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://eliszdel7xj7vkkkkpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/public/trip-data.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
    WHERE result.trip_distance > 0 AND
    medallion = '059A0953850A7AB184964FA36C1B0C6B'
    --WHERE  pickup_datetime >= '2013-01-01' and pickup_datetime < '2013-01-08' 
    Order By pickup_datetime Asc
